_header: At the short game of tables for to play
Subjects: The Game of Love; love, game of; envoys
_description:
The Game of Love, translated from the French of Charles d’Orléans (Champollion-Figeac (1842)
XChampollion-Figeac, Aime. Les Poesies du duc Charles d’Orleans. Paris, 1842, 100) — three 8-line stanzas and 5-line Envoy

BLHar682.First Lines:
At the short game of tablis forto playLoue hath me long had in his
                    gouernaunce…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…How that y myght avoyde this iupart hereTo wynne the game
                    withouten more dowtaunce
